quotes.author: Steve Jobs
quotes.quote: Focus is about saying no.

quotes.author: Henry Ford
quotes.quote: Obstacles are those frightful things you see when you take your eyes off your goal.

quotes.author: Tony Robbins
quotes.quote: Where focus goes, energy flows.

quotes.author: Zig Ziglar
quotes.quote: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.

quotes.author: Dalai Lama
quotes.quote: Remember that sometimes not getting what you want is a wonderful stroke of luck.

quotes.author: Michael Hyatt
quotes.quote: You can’t do it all, but you can do what matters most.

quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi
quotes.quote: The future depends on what you do today.

quotes.author: Albert Einstein
quotes.quote: Any intelligent fool can make things bigger and more complex. It takes a touch of genius and a lot of courage to move in the opposite direction.

quotes.author: David Allen
quotes.quote: Your mind is for having ideas, not holding them.

quotes.author: Buddha
quotes.quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.

quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.quote: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.

quotes.author: Tim Ferriss
quotes.quote: Focus on being productive instead of busy.

quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quotes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.

quotes.author: Stephen R. Covey
quotes.quote: The key is not to prioritize what’s on your schedule, but to schedule your priorities.

quotes.author: Confucius
quotes.quote: Wherever you go, go with all your heart.

quotes.author: Tony Hsieh
quotes.quote: Chase the vision, not the money.

quotes.author: Brian Tracy
quotes.quote: Your ability to focus and concentrate is the key to your success.

quotes.author: Richard Branson
quotes.quote: Business opportunities are like buses, there's always another one coming.

quotes.author: Jim Collins
quotes.quote: You can't fly with the eagles if you hang out with the turkeys.

quotes.author: Cal Newport
quotes.quote: Clarity leads to mastery.

quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius
quotes.quote: You have power over your mind—not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.

quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quotes.quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.

quotes.author: Og Mandino
quotes.quote: I will act now. I will act now. I will act now.

quotes.author: Simon Sinek
quotes.quote: People don’t buy what you do; they buy why you do it.

quotes.author: William James
quotes.quote: The art of being wise is knowing what to overlook.

quotes.author: Marie Forleo
quotes.quote: Success doesn’t come from what you do occasionally; it comes from what you do consistently.

quotes.author: Sharon Lechter
quotes.quote: It's not what happens to you, but how you react to it that matters.

quotes.author: Wayne Dyer
quotes.quote: You cannot always control what goes on outside. But you can always control what goes on inside.

quotes.author: Napoleon Hill
quotes.quote: What the mind of man can conceive and believe, it can achieve.

quotes.author: Daniel Kahneman
quotes.quote: Nothing in life is as important as you think it is while you are thinking about it.

quotes.author: Peter Drucker
quotes.quote: There is nothing so useless as doing efficiently that which should not be done at all.

quotes.author: Walt Disney
quotes.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
